manga.description: Japanese manga style with distinctive features
manga.base_prompt: manga style, anime style, cel shading, clean lines, expressive eyes, dynamic poses
manga.negative_prompt: realistic, photorealistic, 3d render, western comic, european comic

western.description: American comic book style with bold colors and dramatic lighting
western.base_prompt: comic book style, american comic, bold colors, dramatic lighting, superhero style, detailed linework
western.negative_prompt: manga, anime, realistic, photorealistic, european comic
western.color_palette: bold primary colors with dramatic contrast
western.line_style: thick, bold lines with detailed crosshatching

european.description: Franco-Belgian comic style with detailed artwork and sophisticated storytelling
european.base_prompt: european comic style, ligne claire, detailed artwork, sophisticated composition, belgian comic
european.negative_prompt: manga, anime, american comic, superhero style
european.color_palette: muted, sophisticated colors with atmospheric lighting
european.line_style: clean, precise lines with attention to detail

webcomic.description: Modern digital webcomic style with clean, accessible artwork
webcomic.base_prompt: webcomic style, digital art, clean lines, modern comic, accessible artwork, simple shading
webcomic.color_palette: bright, accessible colors with good contrast
webcomic.line_style: clean, consistent lines suitable for web display

vintage.description: Classic comic strip style reminiscent of golden age comics
vintage.base_prompt: vintage comic style, golden age comic, retro comic strip, classic comic art, old school comic
vintage.negative_prompt: modern, digital art, manga, anime, contemporary
vintage.color_palette: limited, nostalgic colors often with newsprint texture
vintage.line_style: bold, simple lines with classic comic proportions

noir.description: Dark, moody comic style with high contrast and dramatic shadows
noir.base_prompt: noir comic style, dark moody atmosphere, high contrast, dramatic shadows, film noir aesthetic
noir.negative_prompt: bright colors, cheerful, light atmosphere, manga, anime
noir.color_palette: monochrome with high contrast, occasional accent colors
noir.line_style: bold, dramatic lines with heavy shadows
